Uses of Interface
org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.AuthenticationHandler

  • Packages that use AuthenticationHandler 
    Package Description
    org.jasig.cas.authentication
    Authentication validates the Credentials provided during a /login request.
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler
    The handler package contains the classes used to authenticate a user.

    • Uses of AuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.authentication

      Constructors in org.jasig.cas.authentication with parameters of type AuthenticationHandler 
      Constructor and Description
      LegacyAuthenticationHandlerAdapter(AuthenticationHandler legacy)
      Creates a new instance that adapts the given legacy authentication handler.
      LegacyAuthenticationHandlerAdapter(AuthenticationHandler legacy, CredentialsAdapter adapter)
      Creates a new instance that adapts the given legacy authentication handler.

    • Uses of AuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler

      Subinterfaces of AuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  NamedAuthenticationHandler
      Deprecated. 
      The CAS 4.0 AuthenticationHandler provides support for named handlers, which makes this interface redundant.
